Sentencas: The aim of this study was to highlight the interest of using CFD technique as a diagnostic tool of a malfunctioning Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: CFD modelling of hydrogen starvation conditions in a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Hydrogen starvation of a SOFC due to nitrogen dilution is one of the cell dysfunctions and can lead to its degradation.
Titulo: CFD modelling of hydrogen starvation conditions in a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Identification of the starvation point allows to improve cell performance and establish the best conditions for degradation tests.
Titulo: CFD modelling of hydrogen starvation conditions in a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: To illustrate a potential of the CFD tool, several simulations of a single planar SOFC and its behaviour under hydrogen starvation were performed and analysed.
Titulo: CFD modelling of hydrogen starvation conditions in a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The results showed that at lower cell voltage values of 0.3 and 0.5 V significant gradients in the electric current were noticed due to a local reduction in hydrogen concentration.
Titulo: CFD modelling of hydrogen starvation conditions in a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The CFD analysis allowed defining desirable mass flow rate of hydrogen to SOFCs to avoid fuel starvation.
Titulo: CFD modelling of hydrogen starvation conditions in a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The model constitutes a helpful tool for optimizing cell design and operational conditions.
Titulo: CFD modelling of hydrogen starvation conditions in a planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
